name: Pillars of Babel
description:
They built a tower to reach the heavens, but now it is crashing down. Are you the one worthy enough to scale the falling pillars and finally bridge the great divide between heaven and earth?

My first effort at a simple 3D game built with Unity and modeled with MagicaVoxel. Works best with a keyboard/mouse or a gamepad. Thanks for playing.

  • Enter or Start to begin/return to menu
  • WASD or Left Stick to move
  • Mouse or Right Stick to look around
  • Spacebar or South Button to jump
  • HOLD jump to glide
  • Jump between platforms, collect orbs, and get 100 points to win
  • White orbs are worth 1 and red orbs are worth 5
  • Beat the game to unlock additional modes and skins
